SVGAttributeViewBox.summary: The viewBox attribute defines the position and dimension, in user space, of an SVG viewport.

remarks.para: The value of the viewBox attribute is a list of four numbers: min-x, min-y, width and height. The numbers min-x and min-y represent the top left coordinates of the viewport. The numbers width and height represent its dimensions. These numbers, which are separated by whitespace and/or a comma, specify a rectangle in user space which is mapped to the bounds of the viewport established for the associated SVG element (not the browser viewport).
